ygData.subject: Re: Lanys T'yvl...
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, though no one will admit it you are exactly right about cute female chars getting free stuff. My wife and I both play, we started at the same time,
ygData.messageBody:
You know, though no one will admit it you are
exactly right about cute female chars getting free stuff.
My wife and I both play, we started at the same
time, but she has so much more stuff than I do, people
give her things all the time. I have some friends that
are male but play female chars online. I could never
understand why they would do that until I saw what you are
describing, people just give them stuff, lots of stuff, not
knowing they are really males behind the EQ masks! I
could never play a female char, it would just be too
weird, but I understand why others do. I have also seen
my friends flurting with players even to the point
of traveling to visit, most of the time coming home
disappointed. I tried to tell them to get a clue, they dont
look like they do in the game, but you know what?....
neither do you!!<br>That is all.<br><br>Kanjien<br>19th
season WE Ranger<br><br>Uinan D'Mortuus<br>26th season
DE SK<br><br>Erollisi Marr Server
